org.archive.crawler.settings.refinements

类 RegularExpressionCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.crawler.settings.refinements.RegularExpressionCriteria
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Criteria

    public class RegularExpressionCriteria
extends java.lang.Object
implements Criteria
    A refinement criteria that test if a URI matches a regular expression.

    • 构造器概要
